channel.title: Amount of cash you get public static int | 317 |Delta
channel.description:
Base: BlindScape Revision: 317 (or 377?) | Delta ==================================
So I added [code] public static int Cash[] = { 995, 1,995, 100 };[/code] and the other necessary stuff for thieving and it works, it gives me one of the random items in there. But I want it to give me either [b]995, 1[/b] (one GP) or [b]995, 100[/b] (100 GP), instead it gives me either one of item ID 995 or one of item ID 1 or one of item ID 100.
Is there any way to make it give me a certain amount of one item? because ID, Amount doesn't work as it counts the number after the [b],[/b] as another item for the random int

item.title: Amount of cash you get public static int | 317 |Delta
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

In OP’s case.

if (Misc.random(2) == 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 100);
} else {
c.getItems().addItem(995, 1);
}

Read full topic
item.source: Amount of cash you get public static int | 317 |Delta

item.title: Amount of cash you get public static int | 317 |Delta
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

sooo, idk, try something like this

if (Misc.random(5) == 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, Misc.random(500)+1);
} else {
c.getItems().addItem(randomItemhere, 1);
}

typed up from scratch to give you a little lead way. convert that code and you should be set.

Read full topic
item.source: Amount of cash you get public static int | 317 |Delta

[quote=“Saletana, post:1, topic:452518”]Base: BlindScape

So I added

and the other necessary stuff for thieving and it works, it gives me one of the random items in there.
But I want it to give me either 995, 1 (one GP) or 995, 100 (100 GP), instead it gives me either one of item ID 995 or one of item ID 1 or one of item ID 100.

Is there any way to make it give me a certain amount of one item? because ID, Amount doesn’t work as it counts the number after the , as another item for the random int[/quote]
easy way of doing it(not the best way) is making a new array with amounts.

item.title: Amount of cash you get public static int | 317 |Delta
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

[quote=“Saletana, post:4, topic:452518”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=555397.msg4066153#msg4066153 date=1343910993]

not sure but try it to add twice,like this.
public static int Cash[] = {995, 100}; public static int Cash[] = { 995, 1};
Hope it helped, if it didn’t help I apologise

Lmao, good work.
[/quote]

I know that you can’t define more than one int to one item, so that can’t work[/quote]
alright sorry then

Read full topic
